tasks.label: clean compile spigot
tasks.command: cd dockerfiles/spigot/build && rm -f spigot-*.jar && java -Xms512M -jar BuildTools.jar --compile SPIGOT

tasks.label: clean download bungeecord
tasks.command: mkdir -p dockerfiles/bungeecord/build && cd dockerfiles/bungeecord/build && rm -f BungeeCord.jar && curl -o BungeeCord.jar https://ci.md-5.net/job/BungeeCord/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/bootstrap/target/BungeeCord.jar
